response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item is valued at $10,000 by both myself and you, ensuring mutual satisfaction. Considering its high quality and unparalleled features, I propose a special introductory offer of $9,500. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant savings for you while allowing me to maximize the value of this product. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 9500}
